summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to other attorneys on the Ghislaine Maxwell defense team, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (a reply regarding a continuance) in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell.

events.title: Filing of Reply re Continuance
events.description: The defense team files a reply regarding a motion for continuance in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Bobbi Sternheim, a defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell.
It transmits a courtesy copy of a court filing titled 'Maxwell_Reply_re-_Continuance.pdf' filed on April 15, 2021.
The filing is part of the ongoing criminal case United States v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).
The email is addressed to other members of Maxwell's defense legal team: Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The correspondence demonstrates active legal proceedings and coordination within Maxwell's defense team in April 2021.
